display_long_description:
PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, your limitless **free-to-play** casino. Leap into multiplayer **poker, blackjack, roulette, craps, sportsbook** and **slots!** Score a **30,000 Chips welcome bonus** and spin for **free chips every 8 hours**.
[media]
Explore **breathtaking venues** from stunning casinos and open-air poker rooms to galactic space stations, or your own **luxury suite**.
[media]
Take on friends and players worldwide at the casino or in private games. **Chat live** and study their tells!
[media]
Light up the tables with endless **props** and deck out your avatar with **customizable apparel**.
[media]
Play **cash, Spin & Go, and tournament poker** daily, with epic leaderboards. Become a Metaverse Poker Tour champion!
[media]
Check out **craps, blackjack and roulette**, plus Infinity Roulette, and back your favorite team - **all under one roof**!
[media]
Spin a **world-class range** of slots packed with bonuses and prizes. Play in companion mode, your suite, the casino, or the Slots Floor.
[media]
Win big with our own **progressive Infinity Jackpot!**
[media]
Take Vegas home with you with **full mixed reality**.
[media]
Your seat is open.
[media]
This is not a gambling product and does not provide an opportunity to win real money. **18+ only**. Please play responsibly.
Access to IAP may be restricted by location.
VOIP real-time chat is monitored by ToxMod.
